about_the_game:
Experience the music that shapes and enhances game Wish Us Luck's various moods.


Wish Us Luck Official Soundtrack is an audio interpretation of Gude City - a place where anything can happen. And now you can lose yourself in this city, too.

Featuring songs from the game in extended versions, you can now enjoy the soundscapes you know like never before.

But there's more: we've prepared a treat for you, fine citizens of Gude City. You're also getting FOUR BONUS TRACKS. Ambient music inspired by Wish Us Luck - the game. These tracks are the perfect companion when you want inspiration and focus on work and studies. So sit down, press play and enjoy.

Wish Us Luck Official Soundtrack is written and arranged by Arlam Júnior - a Brazilian composer and music producer. He has contributed to over 50 digital games, besides feature films and other projects for Netflix and Amazon Prime, plus authorial work.

name: Wish Us Luck - Original Soundtrack
short_description: Delve deeper into the Wish Us Luck experience with its Official Soundtrack. Revisit Gude City in a collection of original soundscapes from the game, in extended versions. Plus, BONUS TRACKS - the perfect companion when you want inspiration and focus on work and studies.
